FinancialAccountMilestone.name: FinancialAccountMilestone
FinancialAccountMilestone.description: Represents the events in the lifecycle of a financial account.

Address.description: The address associated with the milestone.

City.description: The city where the milestone occurred.

Country.description: The country where the milestone occurred.

ExpiredDate.description: The expiration date of the milestone.

FinancialAccountId.description: The ID of the financial account that's associated with the milestone.

GeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically provides this value based on the milestone location’s latitude and longitude coordinates.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Latitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the milestone location. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

LocationId.description: The ID of the location associated with the milestone.

Longitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the milestone location. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and 180 with up to 15 decimal places.

MilestoneDate.description: The date on which the milestone occurred.

PostalCode.description: The postal code of the location where the milestone occurred.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the milestone in the external system.

SourceSystemName.description: The external system from where the record was imported.

Stage.description: Specifies the stage of the milestone.

StageComment.description: The comments about the stage of the milestone. For example, the reason for marking the milestone as tentative.

State.description: The state where the milestone occurred.

Street.description: The street where the milestone occurred.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type of the financial account milestone.
